title: Install Wizard skill
description: Create an install wizard skill that helps new users set up ralphtools and dependencies. Checks for required CLIs (gh, op, gum, fswatch), guides token configuration, sets up symlinks, and validates the installation.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create SKILL.md router (~50 lines) with workflow references
Create workflows/install-deps.md for installing missing deps via brew
Create workflows/setup-tokens.md for API token configuration
Create workflows/setup-symlinks.md for skill symlink creation
Check for: gh, op, gum, fswatch, jq, git
Guide user through 1Password setup for API keys
